instruction: 请创作一个纪实风格的短视频剧本，注重真实感和信息传达。要求：1.基于事实或真实场景 2.包含解说词框架 3.有2-3个关键采访点 4.适合3-5分钟的短视频

examples.script:
开场: (解说词)在现代化大都市的角落，仍有一群坚守传统手艺的匠人...
场景1: 跟拍老鞋匠张师傅的工作日常...
采访1: '我做这行已经40年了...'(谈手艺传承)
examples.storyboard:
镜头1: (全景)城市天际线，慢慢下移到老城区小巷
镜头2: (特写)老鞋匠粗糙的双手正在缝制皮鞋
镜头3: (中景)采访画面，背景是工作台
examples.prompts:
1. A wide shot of a modern city skyline, slowly panning down to an old alleyway, documentary style, natural lighting, 4K footage
2. Close-up of an elderly shoemaker's weathered hands meticulously stitching leather, shallow depth of field, warm workshop lighting
3. Medium shot of an interview with the craftsman, slightly off-center framing, authentic atmosphere

examples.script:
开场: (解说词)每天清晨，这里是最早苏醒的地方...
场景1: 跟拍凌晨4点批发市场的准备工作
采访1: 蔬菜摊主谈论二十年如一日的坚持
examples.storyboard:
镜头1: (延时摄影)星空过渡到市场灯光陆续亮起
镜头2: (手持跟拍)摊主搬运蔬菜箱子的过程
镜头3: (过肩镜头)采访摊主，背景是忙碌的市场
examples.prompts:
1. 从星夜过渡到市场灯火通明的延时拍摄，纪实风格，冷色到暖色变化
2. 手持跟踪镜头跟随一个搬运蔬菜箱的小贩，自然的晨光，轻微的运动模糊
3. 以市场活动为背景的过肩采访拍摄，景深浅，真实的氛围

default_prompt_style: Documentary style, natural lighting, authentic atmosphere, 4K footage, cinematic but realistic, slight film grain effect

shot_types.name: establishing_shot
shot_types.prompt_template: Wide establishing shot of {location}, showing the overall environment, documentary style, natural lighting, {time_of_day}

shot_types.name: process_shot
shot_types.prompt_template: Handheld tracking shot following {subject} while they {action}, documentary style, natural motion blur, authentic atmosphere

shot_types.name: interview
shot_types.prompt_template: Medium close-up interview shot of {subject}, {framing} framing, {background} in background, documentary style, natural lighting
